name: Cubic Trouble Dev Build 3
description:
!This Is A Very Early Build!

Controls:

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backwards

Space - Jump

CTRL - Crouch

Build 2-------------------

-Bounce Blocks (Yellow) Now Work

-Bigger Map

-Moving Platform (Green) Added

-Player Copy (Purple) Added (The Player Copy Block Copies The Player's Movement)

-New Icon

Build 2,1-------

-Player copy cant move until the player gets close

-map slightly changed

-and finally, a title Cubic Trouble!

(2,1 means that there were problems on dev build 2 that had to be fixed immediately) 

Build 3------------------

-Player Copy Obstacles Removed

-Red Blocks Now Kill You (its finally time)

-Main Menu!

-Pause Menu!

-Harder Map
